instructions: While you re wearing your earphones or headphones, move your iPhone close to your friend s open charging case. On your iPhone, tap Temporarily Share Audio, then follow the onscreen instructions.

Ask your friend to briefly press (for less then 1 second) the power button on their headphones. While you re wearing your earphones or headphones, move your iPhone close to your friend s headphones. On your iPhone, tap Temporarily Share Audio, then follow the onscreen instructions.

Wear your earphones or headphones. On your iPhone, tap the Playback Destination button in the Now Playing controls, either in the app you re listening to or on the Lock screen. Or open Control Center , touch and hold the Now Playing controls at the top right, then tap the Playback Destination button . Tap Share Audio (below the name of your earphones or headphones). Bring your iPhone close to your friend s iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch. Tap Share Audio on your iPhone. Ask your friend to tap Join on their device.
